Name: Fiery Heart
LongDescription: Slightly boosts Attack and Special Attack. Keep it in the Treasure Bag to give its benefit to all of these team members: Charmander, Charmeleon, and Charizard.  Swap a Char-Claw and a Char-Fang for a Fiery Heart at the Croagunk Swap Shop.  See what happens if you collect all three of these items!
